## writeToLocalStorage() function

Write a given exposition state to the local storage

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function writeToLocalStorage<T extends Exposition$1<any>>(exposition: T, key?: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  exposition | T | from which the values will be extracted |
|  key | string | <i>(Optional)</i> custom keyname for the store name |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Example

const exposition = createExposition(<!-- -->{ auth: { options: \['valid ✅', 'deny ❌'\] } } as const)

writeToLocalStorage(exposition)
